Ingredients.9: 2 pounds flank steak, trimmed of fat

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Combine jalapeno, garlic, kosher salt, and 1 teaspoon black pepper in a mortar. Grind into a paste.

Directions.2: Pour lime juice, orange juice, and vinegar into a glass bottle or lidded container; add garlic mixture and shake well. Place steak in a shallow bowl and pour marinade over. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until steak absorbs flavors, 4 to 6 hours.

Directions.3: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.4: Remove steak from the marinade and place on a cutting board. Season with salt and pepper and slice against the grain into thin strips.

Directions.5: Grill until slightly charred and light pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side.
